text: Pane lon takot atra nyang salah Pakri lon takot charikat gata Kon lagee gata cit meunan ulah Di gata bandum pih tan teumakot Tapeucharikat laen ngon Allah Hana Neupeutron sapeue di Tuhan Nyang jeut alasan peue nyang tapeugah Teuma soe nyang hak gatanyoe dua Aman bak bala Neubri le Allah Meunyo tateupue bandum atranyan
